text:
*[Bug 18837] glib-2.0.pc gives disallow cflags*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18837>

Tomas Kalibera (<mailto:tomas.kalibera@gmail.com|tomas.kalibera@gmail.com>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
         Resolution|---                         |FIXED
             Status|UNCONFIRMED                 |CLOSED

--- Comment #1 from Tomas Kalibera (<mailto:tomas.kalibera@gmail.com|tomas.kalibera@gmail.com>) ---
Thanks for the report. Removed from the .pc file in development version of
Rtools. This option is the default used by the compiler on Windows targets, so
doesn't have to be specified explicitly.
